tool_description: Searches existing patient database to identify potential duplicate records based on demographic matching algorithms.

first_name.description: Patient's first name for duplicate checking

last_name.description: Patient's last name for duplicate checking

date_of_birth.description: Patient's date of birth for matching

phone_number.description: Patient's phone number for additional matching

error_messages: Database connection error: Unable to access patient records database for duplicate checking.
Invalid search criteria: Minimum required fields (first_name, last_name, date_of_birth) must be provided.
Search timeout: Duplicate checking process exceeded maximum allowed time.
Invalid date format: Date of birth must be a valid date in proper format.
usage: Provide first_name, last_name, and date_of_birth as minimum requirements. Include phone_number and address for more accurate duplicate detection.

match_count.description: Number of potential duplicate records found

match_scores.description: Confidence scores for each potential duplicate (0.0-1.0)

patient_ids.description: IDs of potentially duplicate patient records
